name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly utilizing **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proficient in frontend and backend development, with a solid grasp of both **React Native** and **Expo** for mobile applications. Demonstrated capability in building scalable solutions and enhancing user experiences through agile practices. 
Skilled communicator, fluent in both English and Polish, with strong teamwork and self-motivation skills, which have facilitated successful collaboration across multidisciplinary teams.
Additionally, possesses hands-on expertise in **Python**, **Flutter**, and experience in hands-on deployment of applications in cloud environments such as **AWS** and **Azure**. Familiarity with compliance-driven development and adeptness in leveraging AI/ML technologies for advanced predictive analytics and automation.

Enhanced collaboration strategies within the team, promoting best practices in coding and agile methodologies to optimize workflows for continuous improvement.
Demonstrated adaptability by learning and integrating new frameworks and libraries as required to meet project demands, enhancing overall team productivity.

Utilized **TypeScript**, **React** (18), and **Next.js** to build interactive front-end applications, enhancing user experience for financial tools and admin panels.
Implemented scalable back-end solutions with **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **PostgreSQL**, improving performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Collaborated effectively in a team environment, leveraging strong **communication skills** to coordinate with cross-functional teams on project development.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, incorporating efficient development practices and self-motivation to meet project deadlines.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, which provided operational teams with insights into transactions and anomalies, improving decision-making.
Designed an event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, allowing seamless asynchronous communication across critical workflows.
Developed and optimized ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from both internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, ensuring reliable data processing.
Created ML models for fraud detection employing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enhancing proactive security measures and improving transactional safety metrics by **30%**.
Built machine learning pipelines for various operational needs, including credit scoring and transaction classification, integrating them into back-end services using **MLflow** and **Airflow**.

Utilized **TypeScript** in developing responsive, user-friendly applications using **React** (18) and **Next.js**, ensuring high code quality and maintainability for cross-platform solutions.

Engaged in teamwork to brainstorm and execute innovative solutions for complex coding challenges while adhering to best practices in development and version control using tools like Git.
Actively contributed to maintaining documentation, providing clear guidelines and maintenance instructions for future developers, ensuring smooth transitions and handoffs.
Utilized feedback from peer code reviews to refine skills and foster a collaborative working environment focused on mutual growth.
